full_summary:
### Dental Laboratory Services - Tender Notice

#### Solicitation No: 21201-23-4411998
#### Amendment No: 2
#### Publication Date: June 14, 2023

#### Bidding Opportunities

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for dental laboratory services. This solicitation is open to all interested suppliers.

#### Services and Deliverables

The CSC requires a provider to offer dental laboratory services to its clients in federal institutions located in New Brunswick and Nova Scotia. The successful bidder will be required to manufacture, repair, and reline dentures, as well as adjust them to ensure proper fit. The contractor must use Lucitone 199 and bioform I.P.N. for teeth in their products.

The services to be provided include:

* Manufacturing of full and partial dentures and bite planes after receipt of impressions and according to the dentist's directions
* Adjusting dentures that do not fit, according to impressions, at no additional cost
* Repairing and relining dentures according to the dentist's directions
* Returning finished dentures and bite planes to the user institution within five working days
* Performing emergency repairs and returning repaired dentures or bite planes to the user institution within 48 hours

#### Contract Duration and Options

The contract is expected to commence on November 1, 2023, and will have an initial duration of one year, with four additional one-year option periods.

#### Eligibility and Qualifications

Interested suppliers must have the necessary qualifications and experience to provide dental laboratory services of the required quality.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The selection will be based on the lowest price, among compliant bids.

#### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is July 14, 2023, at 1:00 PM (Atlantic Time).

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Sylvie Gallant, Contracting Authority
506-378-8724

#### Additional Resources

Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. Interested suppliers can find more information on the Buy and Sell - Tenders website.

The successful bidder will be required to enter into a Standing Offer agreement with the CSC. This agreement will include security requirements. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.  Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
